flavorText: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.

foreignData.flavorText: Es könnten Mächte existieren, die noch mächtiger als Phyrexia sind.
foreignData.name: Sonnenexplosions-Engel
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Sonnenexplosions-Engel ins Spiel kommt, zerstöre alle getappten Kreaturen.

foreignData.flavorText: Puede que existan poderes aún más grandes que Pirexia.
foreignData.name: Ángel ráfaga solar
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Ángel ráfaga solar entre al campo de batalla, destruye todas las criaturas giradas.

foreignData.flavorText: Il se pourrait qu'il existe des puissances encore plus redoutables que Phyrexia.
foreignData.name: Ange solaire
foreignData.text:
Vol
Quand l'Ange solaire arrive sur le champ de bataille, détruisez toutes les créatures engagées.

foreignData.flavorText: Potrebbero esistere poteri ancora più immensi di Phyrexia.
foreignData.name: Angelo dell'Esplosione Solare
foreignData.text:
Volare
Quando l'Angelo dell'Esplosione Solare entra nel campo di battaglia, distruggi tutte le creature TAPpate.

foreignData.name: Ангел Солнечного Взрыва

name: Sunblast Angel
originalText:
Flying
When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.

rulings.text: The second ability destroys each creature that's tapped at the time it resolves, including creatures you control. If Sunblast Angel has become tapped by the time its ability resolves, it will be destroyed too.

text:
